description: Decay the LR based on the inverse square root of the update number.

params.name: warmup_steps
params.description: The number of warmup steps. A super parameter.

params.name: learning_rate
params.description: The learning rate. It is a python float number. Defaults to 1.0.

params.name: last_epoch
params.description: The index of last epoch. Can be set to restart training. Default: -1,means initial learning rate.

params.name: verbose
params.description: If True, prints a message to stdout for eachupdate. Defaults to False.
